name: The Bro Mitzvah
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Chris Harris, Craig Gerard (executive story editor), Matthew Zinman (executive story editor), Dan Gregor (executive story editor), Doug Mand (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Ted and Marshall turn Barney's bachelor party into the worst night of his life, or is that exactly what they want him to believe?
